hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{5}{:}{\blueE{05}}$ is $\blueE{5}$ ticks from $\redD{5}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 5. The long minute hand points to 1. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/32c53c89a80267888cf320b6c3a9d78f70666a4d)

$\redD{1}{:}{\blueE{25}}$ is $\blueE{25}$ ticks from $\redD{1}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is past 1. The long minute hand points to 5. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/43fa4517a5fff374006a7c1e0bef6da4c79e4889)

Notice the hour hand is past $1{:}00$ but not quite to $2{:}00$.

$\redD{5}{:}{\blueE{25}}$ is $\blueE{25}$ ticks from $\redD{5}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is past 5. The long minute hand points to 5. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7d24f93ae1e01e3b59e5a3fc637613411dc524b3)

Notice the hour hand is past $5{:}00$ but not quite to $6{:}00$.

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$5{:}05$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 5. The long minute hand points to 1. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e1e427ca92c9cb7663b37ffc7f90ed9716bd4d87)
$1{:}25$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is past 1. The long minute hand points to 5. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/97049b41aa67d4bbf7ac0a3e7ba27129a0c1cbd8)
$5{:}25$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is past 5. The long minute hand points to 5. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f7aa8ed8efba4f24308927b7086ea46f81c40b4d)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 1. The long minute hand points to 5. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e1e427ca92c9cb7663b37ffc7f90ed9716bd4d87)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 5. The long minute hand points to 1. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/97049b41aa67d4bbf7ac0a3e7ba27129a0c1cbd8)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 5. The long minute hand points to 5. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f7aa8ed8efba4f24308927b7086ea46f81c40b4d)
